English: lit. Sow melon and you get melon, sow beans and you get beans (idiom); fig. As you sow, so shall you reap.

h.b: ㄓㄨㄥˋ　ㄍㄨㄚ　ㄉㄜˊ　ㄍㄨㄚ　ㄓㄨㄥˋ　ㄉㄡˋ　ㄉㄜˊ　ㄉㄡˋ

e: `如~：「`俗話~`說~：『`種瓜得瓜，種豆得豆~。』`成功~`是~`需要~`付出~`一定~`代價~`的~。」

h.p: zhòng guā dé guā zhòng dòu dé dòu

English: lit. Sow melon and you get melon, sow beans and you get beans (idiom); fig. As you sow, so shall you reap.
One must live with the consequences of one's actions.
You've made your bed, now must lie on it.
